document.full_text: a volcano dormant for decades erupted in south-central chile saturday, belching ash over 6 miles into the sky and prompting the government to evacuate several thousand residents, authorities said.
document.title: chile volcano erupts, spits towering ash column
lines_and_colors: a volcano dormant for decades erupted in south-central chile saturday, belching ash over 6 miles into the sky and prompting the government to evacuate several thousand residents, authorities said.
